member.name: T:WebApi.Software.Standard.Base.Data.Database.PlanetModel
member.summary: Represents a planet in our solar system.

member.name: P:WebApi.Software.Standard.Base.Data.Database.PlanetModel.Id
member.summary: A unique planet ID in the database.

member.name: P:WebApi.Software.Standard.Base.Data.Database.PlanetModel.Key
member.summary: A unique text key that has a 1 to 1 relationship to the planet ID based off the name of the planet.

member.name: P:WebApi.Software.Standard.Base.Data.Database.PlanetModel.Name
member.summary: The english name for this planet.

member.name: P:WebApi.Software.Standard.Base.Data.Database.PlanetModel.EquatorialDiameter
member.summary: The diameter of the planet at its equator.

member.name: P:WebApi.Software.Standard.Base.Data.Database.PlanetModel.EquatorialBulge
member.summary: The equatorial bulge is a difference between the equatorial and polar diameters of a planet, due to the centrifugal force exerted by the rotation about the body's axis. A rotating body tends to form an oblate spheroid rather than a sphere.

member.name: P:WebApi.Software.Standard.Base.Data.Database.PlanetModel.PolarDiameter
member.summary: The diameter of a planet measured from pole to pole.

member.name: P:WebApi.Software.Standard.Base.Data.Database.PlanetModel.FlatteningRatio
member.summary: The flattening ratio is a measure of how much an oblate spheroid differs from a sphere. The flattening equals the ratio of the semimajor axis minus the semiminor axis to the semimajor axis.

member.name: P:WebApi.Software.Standard.Base.Data.Database.PlanetModel.RotationPeriod
member.summary: The rotation period of a celestial object (e.g., star, gas giant, planet, moon, asteroid) is as its sidereal rotation period the time that the object takes to complete a single revolution around its axis of rotation relative to the background stars, measured in sidereal time. This type of rotation period differs from the object's synodic rotation period (a solar day), measured in solar time, which may differ by a fractional or multiple rotation to accommodate the portion of the object's orbital period during one day.

member.name: P:WebApi.Software.Standard.Base.Data.Database.PlanetModel.Density
member.summary: The planet density is defined as the ratio of the mass of a planet to the volume of space the planet takes up.

member.name: P:WebApi.Software.Standard.Base.Data.Database.PlanetModel.F
member.summary: f = Flattening which is a measure of the compression of a circle or sphere along a diameter to form an ellipse or an ellipsoid of revolution (spheroid) respectively.

member.name: P:WebApi.Software.Standard.Base.Data.Database.PlanetModel.DeviationFromF
member.summary: The deviation from Flattenting.

member.name: T:WebApi.Software.Standard.Base.Data.Enumerator.PlanetSizeEnum
member.summary: Basic set of Planet sizes.

member.name: F:WebApi.Software.Standard.Base.Data.Enumerator.PlanetSizeEnum.Small
member.summary: A small planet.

member.name: F:WebApi.Software.Standard.Base.Data.Enumerator.PlanetSizeEnum.Medium
member.summary: A medium sized planet.

member.name: F:WebApi.Software.Standard.Base.Data.Enumerator.PlanetSizeEnum.Large
member.summary: A large panet.

member.name: T:WebApi.Software.Standard.Base.Data.Poco.EnvelopePoco`1
member.summary: A structure for returning standardized data packets to a requesting service.
member.typeparam: The data type outside the standardized data returned.

member.name: P:WebApi.Software.Standard.Base.Data.Poco.EnvelopePoco`1.Company
member.summary: The name of the company supporting this API.

member.name: P:WebApi.Software.Standard.Base.Data.Poco.EnvelopePoco`1.ApiName
member.summary: The name of this API.

member.name: P:WebApi.Software.Standard.Base.Data.Poco.EnvelopePoco`1.Copyright
member.summary: The copyright of this API.

member.name: P:WebApi.Software.Standard.Base.Data.Poco.EnvelopePoco`1.Version
member.summary: The version of this API.

member.name: P:WebApi.Software.Standard.Base.Data.Poco.EnvelopePoco`1.Data
member.summary: The data model or list returned with or without children depending on the service requested.

member.name: P:WebApi.Software.Standard.Base.Data.Poco.EnvelopePoco`1.Filter
member.summary: Filter applied to REST query.

member.name: P:WebApi.Software.Standard.Base.Data.Poco.EnvelopePoco`1.NextPage
member.summary: If only a limited set of data was returned and more data exists, the reference of the next set of data will be set here. Otherwise, if there is no more data, this value will be null.

member.name: P:WebApi.Software.Standard.Base.Data.Poco.EnvelopePoco`1.LastPage
member.summary: If the returned data is in a different page than the first page of data, the reference of the last set of data will be set here, if this is the first page, then this valud will be null.

member.name: P:WebApi.Software.Standard.Base.Data.Poco.EnvelopePoco`1.CurrentPage
member.summary: This is the reference to the current page of data.

member.name: P:WebApi.Software.Standard.Base.Data.Poco.EnvelopePoco`1.UtcTimestamp
member.summary: Records the response Timestamp of this envelope in UTC.

member.name: P:WebApi.Software.Standard.Base.Data.Poco.EnvelopePoco`1.Response
member.summary: Returns the response from this request, including errors if any.

member.name: T:WebApi.Software.Standard.Base.Data.Poco.PlanetFilterPoco
member.summary: Specialized filter adding the ability to filter Planets by Planet Size, Minimum Equatorial Diameter and Maximum Diameter.

member.name: P:WebApi.Software.Standard.Base.Data.Poco.PlanetFilterPoco.PlanetSize
member.summary: Filter for planet size.

member.name: P:WebApi.Software.Standard.Base.Data.Poco.PlanetFilterPoco.EquatorialDiameterMinimum
member.summary: Filter for minimum equatorial diameter.

member.name: P:WebApi.Software.Standard.Base.Data.Poco.PlanetFilterPoco.EquatorialDiameterMaximum
member.summary: Filter for minimum equatorial diameter.

member.name: M:WebApi.Software.Standard.Base.Data.Poco.PlanetFilterPoco.Clone
member.summary: Creates a clone of this filter with the same parameters.

member.name: M:WebApi.Software.Standard.Base.Data.Poco.PlanetFilterPoco.Clone(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a clone of this filter changing the paging parameters to the page number.
member.param: The page number to clone too.
